title: Our guide to every Week 18 NFL game: Matchup previews, predictions and what's at stake
description: The Jaguars compete for a division title .. and the No. 1 seed. We have picks, predictions, stats and what's at stake for every game as the regular season reaches its finale.

title: Ravens-Steelers winner takes AFC North: 'This is going to be a slugfest'
description: For years, this feud has become must-watch TV, and Sunday won't be any different in a "winner-takes-all" game.

title: Seahawks silence 49ers, lock up NFC's No. 1 seed
description: In a performance that would make the Legion of Boom proud, the Seahawks kept the 49ers out of the end zone and won 13-3 to secure the NFC's No. 1 seed.

title: Playoff-hopeful Panthers, Bucs to root for rivals
description: The Panthers and Buccaneers have been forced into a peculiar situation, having to pull for different division rivals on Sunday for their team to win the NFC South title and a trip to the playoffs.

description: San Jose State wide receiver Danny Scudero, the nation's leader in receiving yards this season, has committed to transfer to Colorado, sources told ESPN.

description: Former Wisconsin QB Billy Edwards Jr. has committed to sign with North Carolina, sources told ESPN.

title: Rast ends Shiffrin winning streak in WC slaloms

title: CMC owns key drop; 49ers lament missed chances
description: Christian McCaffrey owned a bobbled pass that turned into a game-sealing interception, saying it was a play he had to make. The 49ers were unable to make several key plays in their 13-3 loss to the Seahawks.

title: Amid boos, Baylor's Nnaji debuts in loss at TCU
